name: Dragon's Den
longDesc: You're startled at what was behind the door: a fearsome dragon! You had hoped to never see one from this close up. It rests fitfully here in this large, domed chamber, smoke trailing from it's glowing nostrils. It must have been here a while, it certainly looks to have grown too large to fit through any of the doors.
shortDesc: You stand in the room with the mighty dragon.  You don't dare make any sudden movements... or loud noises.

shelves.name: Pair of Charred Boots
shelves.desc: A pair of charred boots stand in front of the wall where the outline of a person remains scortched on the stone.

shelves.name: Dragon's Egg Shell
shelves.desc: The broken remains of what appears to be the dragon's egg lies in the corner of the room.

doors.name: Scorched Door
doors.desc: The heavy, copper door is completely scorched on the inside from the dragon's fiery breath.  Iron shines brightly from it as it drips to the floor.
doors.unlock_desc: The door is open and you can see the Nexus safely on the otherside.

doors.name: Golden Gate
doors.desc: Another gate lays in front of you. Gold inlay once adorning the gate has melted and burned deeper into the stone. Fortunately, the keyhole that was also forged out of gold and stone has magically remained intact.  Now if only you had the key....
doors.unlock_desc: You push the gate ever-so-slowly trying to be as quiet as possible.  You know the dragon is sleeping, but you aren't sure how long your spell will hold.
